Probulin Probiotic Facial Serum, Unscented

Brand: Probulin

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: WATER, LACTOCOCCUS FERMENT LYSATE, GLYCERIN, VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT/LEAF EXTRACT, SACCHARUM OFFICINARUM (SUGAR CANE) EXTRACT, ACER SACCHARUM (SUGAR MAPLE) EXTRACT, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) FRUIT EXTRACT, CITRUS LIMON (LEMON) FRUIT EXTRA

(LEMON) FRUIT EXTRACT, GLUCOSE, LACTOBACILLUS, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) FRUIT EXTRACT, DEHYDROXANTHAN GUM, ORGANIC ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, LYSOLECITHIN, SCLEROTIUM GUM, XANTHAN GUM, PULLULAN, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, LACTOPEROXIDASE, GLUCOSE OXIDASE

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developm
OW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
